summary: My best friend in game and out!
descriptionHtml:
A little mod/follower I created which adds my hetero life mate best friend Curtis "Cake" Rubright to my game. Basically, this is a personal mod, but in case you need a sacrifice for Boethia, or a "man's man' follower, help yourself!

Location: tavern in Falkreath
author: Brian Dellinger
